summary: A new and fresh Retexture of the Elite Armor set by Locaster
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/23872-1-1347386154.jpg[/img]

I always enjoyed the Elite Archer armor set by Locaster, However it only came out in 1 color: Red, Lately the owner has uploaded a black rexeture, But for those hunters out there like e, Red and Black don\'t really fit in our style, That\'s why I made this Retexure, It\'s brown. Like Leather. It doesn\'t come with any new models though, only new Textures to fit in with the Hunter-theme.

I\'m aiming for making every color, But red and Black, Those are already made by the original author! you can ost a comment on what color I should do next. Although they all will be there!

[10-9-12
Awnsered some community comments and added more pictures. I\'ll make a non-dragoin logo version soon! Although it might turn out horrible!

It\'s my first mod. Positive comments are welcome, As well as negative ones, Although I prefer the good ones!

NOTE: My Skyrim is not even starting up due my crappy computer and my ton of mods! If anyone could test this armor out and maybe upload a few pictures, it will be very much appreciated!

Check out my newest White retexture! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24722/

Original Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22870

Credit to Locaster!
author: Casablancaz
